vote.title: To recognize the Northland Vikings Football team on their historic 2023 season in Columbus, Ohio.
vote.description:
Title
To recognize the Northland Vikings Football team on their historic 2023 season in Columbus, Ohio.
Body
Â 
WHEREAS, the city of Columbus recognizes the hard work and dedication of the Northland Vikings 2023 football team, coaches, staff, and the 2024 football senior class of Northland High School; and 
WHEREAS, this season's accomplishments include back-to-back City North Camps, the best record in school history, their first-ever home playoff game, and first-ever back-to-back playoff appearances; and 
WHEREAS, The team received numerous Honorable Mentions for the All-City Conference, as well as First and Second Team All-Conference; and 
WHEREAS, The Northland Vikings football Class of 2024 accomplished goals that nobody expected. With their first season beginning through COVID-19, this group has shown strength and courage in the face of adversity; and
WHEREAS, Head Coach Ryan Sayers was awarded the Division 2 Central District Coach of the Year; and
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: This Council does hereby recognize and congratulate the Northland High School Vikings on their historic football season.
